pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Automata API## Packaging`python3 -m build`## Development### View API end-points* http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs* http://127.0.0.1:8000/redoc### Start Web ServerInstead of using `uvicorn` with `--reload` (as this does not wire-in dependencies as per this projects' conventions)Use [simulations/serve](simulations/serve/__init__.py)### IssuesBeware of the Zombies `ps aux | grep defunct`
